summary: Completed comprehensive testing of APIForge MVP - API Management and Testing Tool. Backend APIs working excellently (94.4% success rate). Frontend core functionality working with minor redirect issue after login.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_bugs.impact: Very minor - both indicate unauthorized access

ui_bugs.issue: After successful login, app doesn't automatically redirect to dashboard
ui_bugs.workaround: Manual navigation to root URL loads dashboard correctly

ui_bugs.issue: New request button occasionally not visible after collection selection

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix login redirect issue - after successful authentication, app should automatically redirect to dashboard instead of staying on auth page. Also investigate request management UI visibility issues.
